 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשֵׁר‎</span> **verb** ==be advantageous, proper, suitable, succeed==, late Aramaic (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּשָׁר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְכָשֵׁר הַדָּבָר לִפְנֵי הַמֶּלֶךְ‎</span> [[Esth.8.5|Esth 8:5]] ***and the thing be proper in the view of the king; Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִכְשָׁר֨‎</span> [[Eccl.11.6|Eccl 11:6]] thou knowest not whether this ***shall succeed***, or this. **Hiph\`il** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִתְרוֺן הַכְשֵׁיר חָכְמָה‎</span> [[Eccl.10.10|Eccl 10:10]] ***an advantage for giving success is wisdom.***
